mapper.insert: insert into job(job_name, job_cate, academic_requirement, experience_requirement, job_type, detail_pos, city, salary_roof, salary_floor, salary_type, tags, `describe`, requirement) value (#{jobName}, #{jobCate}, #{academicRequirement}, #{experienceRequirement}, #{jobType}, #{detailPos}, #{city}, #{salaryRoof}, #{salaryFloor}, #{salaryType}, #{tags}, #{describe}, #{requirement})
mapper.update: update job set job_name = #{jobName}, job_cate = #{jobCate}, academic_requirement = #{academicRequirement}, experience_requirement = #{experienceRequirement}, job_type = #{jobType}, detail_pos = #{detailPos}, city = #{city}, salary_roof = #{salaryRoof}, salary_floor = #{salaryFloor}, tags = #{tags}, `describe` = #{describe}, requirement = #{requirement}, where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select job.id, job_name, job_cate, academic_requirement, experience_requirement, job_type, detail_pos, city, salary_roof, salary_floor, salary_type, tags, `describe`, requirement from job, hr_job where hr_id = #{openId} and id = jid;
